trans-unit.source: Indicates how to play sounds when calling audio methods.
trans-unit.target: 表示如何在呼叫音訊方法時播放音效。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `AudioPlayMode` enumeration members to control how the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Play%2A> method plays sounds.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用`AudioPlayMode`列舉成員，來控制如何<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Play%2A>方法會播放聲音。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Play%2A>

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""></xref> method to play the sound in the background.
trans-unit.target: 會導致<xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""></xref>方法，以在背景播放音效。

trans-unit.source: The calling code continues to execute.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫程式碼會繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""></xref> method to play the sound in the background until the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Stop*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 會導致<xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""></xref>播放聲音直到背景方法<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Stop*>方法呼叫。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Stop*>

trans-unit.source: The calling code continues to execute.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫程式碼會繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""></xref> method to play the sound, and waits until it completes before calling code continues.
trans-unit.target: 會導致<xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""></xref>方法，以播放音效，並等待，直到完成之前呼叫程式碼會繼續。
